`# download fastqs from sra and split fastqs into reads (difficult to submit as job because of SRA config so run interactively)
```{bash}
sinteractive -p prod --mem 24G --time 2-00:00:00

module load sratoolkit/3.0.0

cd fastqs
fastq-dump --split-3 --verbose SRR20649710 SRR20649711 SRR20649712 SRR20649713 SRR20649714 SRR20649715 SRR20649716 SRR20649717 SRR20649718 SRR20649719 SRR20649720 SRR20649721

# compress after transfer (during is deprecated and not recommended)
gzip *fastq
```
